messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Space Station 13 have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failure imminent. Please contact you*%fj00)`5vc-BZZT

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Unstable bluespace anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

Nanotrasen Superweapons Division is testing a new prototype super-colliding tank, some mild debris is expected.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Today gentlemen, has been a productive day. We have fought the people who tried to tear our lives appart. But i, Harlow Moriarty, Our Ai: IckyOcky and  does the gimmick the scientist have won. Alongside your help by the crew i got just one thing to say: Fuck nanotrasen im joining some other company after this shit. Maybe syndie, who knows, they owe me after today.  At least i will be able to retire. Anyhow, im currently bleeding to death and i have to do some ghetto surgery on my appendictis problem. Hail nanotrasen and that shit.  -Harlow Moriarty QM, possible alchoholic.
